message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $9500. This is a fair price, considering the product's value to you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9200. Can you consider this price?
